Continue with performing HIV 'Assay 1 repeated'Individuals who are reactive on Assay 1 but non-reactive on Assay 2 (A1+; A2−) should be repeated on Assay 1. In the event of discrepant test results (A1+; A2−), it is important to repeat Assay 1. Repeating Assay 1 will determine if the individual is repeatedly reactive on the assay that has the highest sensitivity
